The Iron Yard In Columbia

Serving as the capital of our home state, Columbia, South Carolina embodies what can be accomplished when merging business with tech. We are excited to have partnered with the amazing team at Unmatched Style as we continue to grow the tech scene in Columbia and beyond.

Learn to code. Life's too short for the wrong career.

Our intensive web design course is coming Columbia. Web Design, User Experience and User Interface and launch a new career.

Newsletter

Academy

We are launching an intensive and fully immersive Web Design course in Columbia in 2015. Sign up for our newsletter for updates.

Newsletter

CoWorking Spaces

Innovate and collaborate at SOCO where you will join a community of collaborators and brainstorming partners. With a full kitchen, free wi-fi, complimentary coffee and drinks, and secure 24-hour access, SOCO will feel just like home.

Learn More

Kids Classes

We will launch kids classes in Columbia in early 2015. Sign up for our mailing list to learn more.
